entry.title: Interrupted
entry.summary:
Author: Maximoff_Wanda

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,608Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: A chime sounded from across the diner, and Buck’s eyes darted to the door, spotting three gruff looking men walking in through the door, their eyes taking in the small restaurant.Buck paid them no mind, turning back to Eddie, who was looking at him like he hung the stars themselves. Their waitress came back and placed down their drinks as Buck ran a thumb over the back of Eddie’s hand. Maybe he should be a little embarrassed by how openly sappy they were, but screw that. He was finally on a date with Eddie.“I’m really glad we did this, Buck,” Eddie said quietly.“Me too-” Buck was cut off by a yell from the front of the diner.Whumptober Day 6 Prompt: Pinned to the Wall

entry.title: Repression is my Heaven but I’d Rather Go Through Hell
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,424Chapters: 27/29Kudos: 176

Summary: For a heartbeat, neither of them moved. The morning sun glinted off her hair, the hum of a passing car filling the silence. Shannon shifted first, swallowing hard, her shoulders rising with a shaky breath. “Hi,” she said, her voice soft, tentative. “I’m… I’m Shannon. Eddie’s…” She faltered, her eyes flicking down, then back up to meet his. “Christopher’s mom.” Or, War didn’t break them. Distance didn’t. Shannon just might.

entry.title: Stress Baking
entry.summary:
Author: WillowHatter

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,136Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 42

Summary: He thought about bringing it up to Eddie but he didn’t want to push him. He found out first hand how pushing people into being open can cause a strain on a relationship and the last thing he wanted to be was like Tommy. So he did what he did best when he was stressed he baked. It started off small. A few cupcakes here and there. He would take them into work stating that he just did it to relax as he couldn’t sleep. Then he stepped it up to cakes, he started off making Eddie’s favourite cake but the man didn’t tend to eat all that much of it. So he moved onto Maddie’s and Chim's; this had earned him an eyebrow raise from the pair. Asking if he was alright but once again he stated he just couldn’t sleep. - Buck start's baking to cope with the fact he and Eddie are in a secret relationship.

entry.title: Just Ask Josh
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,600Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 759

Summary: Chim is reading aloud before Buck can lunge across the counter and stop him, “I’d beg so loud they’d all know exactly what you—” His eyebrows climb to his hairline, “Buck, what the fuck?” Ravi bursts out laughing, nearly doubling over, “Wait, you sexted the group chat?!” “No, no, no—” Buck’s voice traitorously cracks and he can feel the heat in his face, “That’s not—I didn’t—” Hen’s tone sharpens, amusement undercut with curiosity, “You’re seeing someone? Who is she?” Or,Three months of secret hookups with Eddie and Buck manages to blow it all with one wrong text.

entry.title: Don't Put It All On Me
entry.summary:
Author: maddies118

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,297Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 67

Summary: By the look in your eyeI can tell that you're no longer sleepingBut we're still dreamingDon't put it all on meBy the end of the dayIt's clear that we're both never leavingBut if we're still breathingDon't put it all on me or Eddie moves back from Texas and in with Buck. Maddie convinces him to pick up some shifts in dispatch to get some space and perspective on the changes in his life. A gay awakening ensues, just in time for a disaster that could risk everything. Angst. Angst angst angst. I promise you a happy ending and some fun chat scenes along the way, but it comes at a price and the price is trauma. This fic starts up shortly after where Season 8 ended, timeline wise. Assume canon compliance through that point, though some things will be glossed over (looking at you, Thomas Kinard). Title is from the song by Noah Cyrus and The Fleet Foxes.

entry.title: What do you think this is?
entry.summary:
Author: rotisserie_marie_chicken

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,769Chapters: 8/9Kudos: 361

Summary: Bobby slaps both gloved palms against the glass. “What are you saying, Buck?”Buck doesn’t reply. He won’t meet Bobby’s eyes. He bows his head a little, reaching for the latch on his helmet.“Buck!” Cold dread spills into the sockets of all of Bobby’s joints. “What are you doing!”Buck fumbles to release the lock, but he gets it on the second try.“Put your helmet back on! Kid!”-OR-Embark with me on an angsty journey as we imagine a universe in which it was not Bobby who was infected with CCHF, but Buck. That means Buck was stuck inside with the team in 8x14 and 8x15 while Bobby was running around outside with Athena. And Buck didn't tell anyone he'd been exposed. Let’s assume everything else is the same. Oh, except no one’s dying this time because I said so.
